about.name: Johnson Otuogha
about.title: Mern-stack Developer
about.subTitle: I develop 3D visuals, user interfaces and web applications
about.description: As a React & Vue Developer with a creative edge and a problem-solving midset. I specialize in building interactive, high performing web application using React, Next, Vue. i love turning complex ideas into clean, functional user interfaces -- combining logic with design. Whether its optimizing performance, managing application state or ensuring mobile responsiveness, i bring a detail-driven approach to every line of code. from reusable components to seamless APIs integration, i aim to craft web experiences that users remember.
about.quote: I design experiences, solve problems, and brings ideals to life one component at a time.
about.address: No3, Ameen street Abule-oja, Yaba Lagos.

timeline.summary: Contributed to the development of a vibrant e-commerce platform offering a wide range of disney-inspired products.
bulletPoints: Developed scalable frontend services using React.js, Node.js, Paystack Payment APIs framework.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using OAuth 2.0 and JWT tokens.
Designed and optimized database schemas for performance and scalability.
Backend developer to design APIs and ensure smooth integration with the frontend.

timeline.summary: Passionate & results-driven instructor with a strong background in frontend developmenty & digital technology education.
bulletPoints: Passionate & results-driven instrctor with a strong foundation in frontend development.
skilled at breaking down complex web development concepts into easy-to-understand lessons.
Adapts teaching style to meet the needs of diverse learners at different skill levels.
Encourage creativity, critical thinking and continuos support.

timeline.summary: Experience & passionate instructor with a focus on pratical, project-based learning in web development.
bulletPoints: Delivered engaging & pratical lessons in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Modern frontend frameworks.
designed & implemented hands-on projects to reinforce real-world problem-solving skills.
Successfully guided students through building and deploying functional web application.
Evaluated students progress through assessments, code reviews, and interactive feedback sessions.
Fostered an inclusive and collaborative learning environment to encourage participation and growth.

timeline.summary: Contributed to the development of a comprehensive CRM solution for enterprise clients.
bulletPoints: Implemented user interface components using Next.js and TypeScript.
Collaborated with backend developers to integrate frontend components with RESTful APIs.
Developed custom data visualizations and dashboards using D3.js and Chart.js.
Participated in sprint planning meetings and provided accurate estimates for feature development.
Conducted A/B tests and analyzed user feedback to iterate on product features.

timeline.summary: Contributed to the development of a cutting-edge web application aimed at revolutionizing software industry.
bulletPoints: Build & maintained the marchlog web platform, focusing on responsive design, seamless user experience, and clean UI using modern frontend technologies.
Collaborated closely with designers and product managers to iterate on user feedback.
Conducted code reviews and provided constructive feedback to team members.
Resolved complex technical challenges to ensure the smooth operation of the application.
Participated in daily stand-up meetings and sprint planning sessions.
Design and build full website
Optimized Site
SEO implemented

projects.title: Jetronticket
projects.description: Jetronticket is a fast, reliable and user-friendly platform for booking tickets to your favorite events, shows and experiences. Whether its concerts, sports, theatre or festivals, JetronTicket connect users with verified sellers, ensure security transactions and seamless access to unforgettable events.

projects.title: Betadisney
projects.description: Is a Nigeria-based online retailer specializing in a wide range of technology products and electronics. The platform offers an extensive selection of items, including laptops, desktops, smartphones and many more accesories with a commitment to adeqendability, customer services, and uniqueness, Betadisney aims to deliver quality products and a seamless shopping experience to customers across Nigeria and beyond.

projects.title: marchloglimited
projects.description: is a Nigerian logistics and freight forwarding company established in 2004. Headquartered in Ikeja, Lagos, the company offers a comprehensive range of logistics services, including air and ocean freight, customs brokerage, and general logistics solutions.

testimonials.name: Samantha Wu
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of working closely with John on a challenging project. He is a highly skilled developer who consistently delivered excellent results. His ability to understand complex requirements and implement efficient solutions was truly impressive. I would highly recommend him to any organization looking for a talented developer.

testimonials.name: David Rodriguez
testimonials.review: Throughout our project, John demonstrated exceptional technical skills and a strong work ethic. He consistently met deadlines and produced high-quality code that exceeded our expectations. His proactive approach to problem-solving and effective communication made him a valuable member of our team

testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of collaborating with John on a complex web application project. His ability to translate design concepts into functional, user-friendly features was impressive. John consistently delivered high-quality work and was always open to feedback. I look forward to working with him again in the future.

testimonials.name: Michael Lee
testimonials.review: John is a skilled developer with a keen eye for detail. He played a crucial role in our team, consistently producing clean, efficient code. His collaborative nature and willingness to take on new challenges make him an invaluable asset to any project."

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.review: Working with John was an absolute delight. Their professionalism and technical prowess were evident from day one. He consistently delivered top-notch code and went above and beyond to ensure the success of our project. I highly recommend him for any development endeavor
